importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: The date of release for the series has not been announced, so no specific release date is available in the article.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: The series spans from the 1930s to 1956, beginning with Joe and Rose Kennedy's rise and covering the formative years of the Kennedy family, including Jack Kennedy's early life and development.

keyTakeAways: Netflix is launching a new drama series titled 'Kennedy' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
The series stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the family's triumphs and tragedies across generations.
The show begins in the 1930s, tracing the ascent of Joe and Rose Kennedy and their nine children, including Jack Kennedy, who struggles to escape the shadow of his older brother.
The series is described as a blend of American mythology and historical nuance, offering insights into both the Kennedy family and broader American history.
The showrunner, Sam Shaw, emphasizes the relevance of the Kennedys as a reflection of American values, struggles, and societal evolution.
The series is distinct from Ryan Murphy’s upcoming 'American Love Story,' which focuses on JFK Jr.
The series will consist of eight episodes and has not yet been released, with no official release date provided.

namedEntities.name: Kennedy family
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: An American political dynasty that produced multiple U.S. presidents and prominent public figures, including John F. Kennedy, Robert F. Kennedy, and JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: The Kennedy family is the central subject of the new Netflix series, with the show exploring their history, struggles, and legacy from the 1930s to 1956.

namedEntities.name: Michael Fassbender
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A British actor known for roles in films such as 'The Theory of Everything' and 'Star Wars: The Last Jedi'.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is cast as Joe Kennedy, Sr., the patriarch of the Kennedy family, making him a central figure in the narrative.

namedEntities.name: Fredrik Logevall
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A historian and author who wrote the biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956'.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His book serves as the source material for the series, providing historical context and depth to the story of the Kennedy family.

namedEntities.name: Sam Shaw
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The showrunner of the new 'Kennedy' series.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is responsible for the creative direction and narrative structure of the series, emphasizing the human and cultural relevance of the Kennedy story.

namedEntities.name: Netflix
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A global streaming platform that produces and distributes original content.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: Netflix is the distributor and producer of the series, signaling its intent to bring a high-profile historical drama to a broad international audience.

namedEntities.name: John F. Kennedy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The 35th U.S. president, son of Joe Kennedy, Sr., and a central figure in the Kennedy legacy.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His rise to power and subsequent assassination are key elements in the family's narrative, which the series explores in depth.

namedEntities.name: JFK Jr.
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: The son of John F. Kennedy, who died in a plane crash in 1999 with his wife and sister-in-law.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: His tragic death is cited as part of the 'Kennedy curse' narrative, contributing to the family’s tragic legacy and emotional depth in the series.

namedEntities.name: Ryan Murphy
namedEntities.whatIsThisEntity: A television producer known for creating shows like 'American Horror Story' and 'American Crime Story'.
namedEntities.whyIsThisEntityRelevantToTheArticle: He is mentioned as the creator of a separate upcoming show, 'American Love Story,' which focuses on JFK Jr., distinguishing it from the new Netflix series.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Netflix has announced a new drama series titled 'Kennedy,' based on Fredrik Logevall’s biography 'JFK: Coming of Age in the American Century, 1917–1956.' The series, set to begin in the 1930s, stars Michael Fassbender as Joe Kennedy, Sr., and explores the family’s rise, internal struggles, and tragic events, including the life and challenges of Jack Kennedy. The show, created by Sam Shaw, is described as a blend of American myth and historical insight, offering a nuanced look at the Kennedy dynasty and its impact on American society. It is distinct from a separate Ryan Murphy-produced series focusing on JFK Jr. and will consist of eight episodes with no official release date yet announced.
title: Netflix Announces New Kennedy Family Series Starring Michael Fassbender
